title: Bhumi Pednekar partners with Chrome Hospitality to invest in Goa's boutique hotel
description: Founded by Pawan Shahri, Dhaval Udeshi and Nikita Shahri, Chrome Hospitality has a presence in Mumbaiâ€™s all day casual-dining space. The brand developed 1,00,000 sq ft of hospitality space in India and launched five new restaurants in Mumbai under the Chrome Hospitality umbrella.
